command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4DB9hJWqLzCzJpD.4ae2ba9639dc --database XodoyKMzPdFiKkVj3QFTGK --execute SELECT * FROM scheduler_jobs LIMIT 5;

rows.config: {"description": "Fetch latest GDP data from World Bank API for Yemen", "endpoint": "https://api.worldbank.org/v2/country/YEM/indicator/NY.GDP.MKTP.CD", "format": "json", "indicators": ["NY.GDP.MKTP.CD", "NY.GDP.MKTP.KD.ZG"], "source": "World Bank"}

{"description": "Fetch latest inflation data from World Bank API", "endpoint": "https://api.worldbank.org/v2/country/YEM/indicator/FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG", "format": "json", "indicators": ["FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG", "FP.CPI.TOTL"], "source": "World Bank"}

{"description": "Fetch latest trade balance data from World Bank API", "endpoint": "https://api.worldbank.org/v2/country/YEM/indicator/NE.EXP.GNFS.CD", "format": "json", "indicators": ["NE.EXP.GNFS.CD", "NE.IMP.GNFS.CD", "BN.GSR.GNFS.CD"], "source": "World Bank"}

{"description": "Fetch World Economic Outlook data for Yemen from IMF", "endpoint": "https://www.imf.org/external/datamapper/api/v1/NGDP_RPCH/YEM", "format": "json", "indicators": ["NGDP_RPCH", "PCPIPCH", "BCA_NGDPD"], "source": "IMF"}

{"description": "Fetch exchange rate data from IMF IFS database", "endpoint": "https://www.imf.org/external/datamapper/api/v1/ENDA_XDC_USD_RATE/YEM", "format": "json", "indicators": ["ENDA_XDC_USD_RATE"], "source": "IMF"}
